channel.title: Exploring Vue :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Install the Vue Extension First, in our Visual Studio Code instance, we will want to install the Vue - Official extension. Make sure it is the correct, official plugin, since there are many that share a similar name in the VS Code extension marketplace: As always, you can click the gear next to the install button to add it to the devcontainer.json file, so it will be installed in future devcontainers built using this repository.
